name: Found Guys - Global Game Jam
description:
Found Guys is a game where you find items in a room! Inspired by the old TV game show called Finders Keepers. 

Can you find the right item in 30 seconds? Let's find out!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021! 

Controls:

Move - WASD/Left Joystick

Jump - Space/West Button

Hold and Throw - Enter/Triggers

(You can use keyboard or controller or a fight stick.)

Credits: 

Squid Maker - Game Design, Level Design -  https://twitter.com/PixelSquid_

Psycho Kelly- Sound Effects and Audio - https://twitter.com/PsychoKelly

DianaKPlace - UI Graphics - https://www.instagram.com/dianakplace/

Very happy with out come of this game and learnt a lot of game desing concept and ideas for 3D games.  Big appreciation towards Psycho Kelly and DianKPlace for their work on this game Jam Project.

I hope you all enjoy Found Guys!
